body.name: Leudaich 14'’ Laptop Monitor Extender for Dual Monitor Dispaly, FHD IPS Portable Monitor for 13”-16” Laptops, HDMI/USB-A/Type-C Plug-Play Dual-Screen for Windows, Chrome, Mac and Switch
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 14 mins
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 14 mins
features: 【High Dynamic Image Quality】14'' FHD IPS Portable laptop monitor provides an ideal display extension with 1080P resolution and 300 nits brightness. The 1000:1 contrast ratio enhances visual depth, allowing you to efficiently multitask using the display for presentations, reference materials or video streaming while working simultaneously on your main device.

【Wide Compatibility】14'' laptop Screen extender portable compatible with Windows, macOS (including M1/M2/M3), Chrome, Android, Switch and Linux, adapts to different operating systems. Its flexibility and compatibility make it the go-to choice for users seeking a reliable second trscreen for laptop portable use and it work with a wide range of laptops (13-17 inches diagonal).

【Single Cable Connection】 The laptop dual monitor extender's can be connected to laptop via USB Type-C/HDMI. Like Thunderbolt 3 (One cable Connection) or HDMI + USB (If USB C port can't provide video signal). No driver installation required, ensure easy integration into your existing tech setup.

【Increase productivity by 200%】The 180° rotation design of the laptop monitor attachment allows it to be flexibly adjusted to the most comfortable viewing angle, and it can be freely set to extended or mirroring mode, enabling simultaneous double screen or independent display, allowing Multitasking and remote working become a breeze. Ideal for meeting presentations and improving your work efficiency.

【Sleek and Portable】 Our 3-pound dual screen is designed for professionals on the move. Its modern design prioritizes practicality and comfort during travel, and it comes with a complimentary carry bag for added portability as an external laptop monitor extender. If you have any questions or concerns regarding compatibility or connection, plz ontact us through our support channels, and we will reply you within 24 hours. Thank you for choosing Leudaich.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Leudaich 14’‘ Laptop Portable Dual Monitor Screen Extender

Brightness adjustment Use the scroll wheel button to easily adjust the menu and brightness. Quickly navigate and adjust menu options with precise brightness control by gently turning the wheel. Compatible with 13-17inch laptop Compatible with laptops up to 17 inches (diagonal), stretchable and comes with rubber pads designed to protect your laptop. Built-in stand Adjustable stand, display screen from multiple angles, no need to worry about the screen crushing laptop
How to connect the laptop monitor extender

Tips Before Purchase: 1. Please make sure your laptop supports 2 video signal transfers so that the dual screens of S2 work well. It means your laptop will have USB-C 3.2 and above (Thunderbolt 3 and above) which can support video signal and power supply at the same time. 2. HDMI and USB-A cables need to be used at the same time. 3. If the USB-A/USB-C port is not enough to power the screen, please use a power adapter (5V/2A or more) to supply the power. 4. Perfectly compatible with 2020 M1 and 2022 M2 chip MacBook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable and affordable monitors
reviews.reviewText: I bought this monitor extender for my home office use. It works really well and is very easy to install. The resolution is good for this screen size. It's affordable with its nice quality and competitive in the monitor extender market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality monitors
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality monitors. I was worried about the weight will drag down the screen. But that’s not the case. The monitors are light enough and the design allows to sit upright. It’s perfect for multitasking. And it doesn’t require any power adapter. It can function with just the power from the laptop. The resolution is acceptable for smaller screens. There’s no lag or latency. My eyes don’t feel tired even after prolonged use. I highly recommend for everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work from anywhere is now pretty easy
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot and always had trouble working on a single screen, found this on Amazon and wanted to test it out, it wasn't heavy and easy to setup, this really helped me to work efficiently and quickly. Really satisfied with the product. Picture quality is good, had not seen any issues so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portal extended screen with great quality
reviews.reviewText: I like to work on my bed when I’m working from home, in this setup it’s impossible to use a traditional desktop monitor. I’m really glad that I found this product that serves perfectly for this purpose! The added screen size and features is exactly what I was looking for(they provided all the needed connecting cords and adapters), the resolution of the screen is great, quality is beyond my expectations, with this setup I could work much more efficiently. Would definitely recommend to others who are in a similar situation as my use case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive quality and no set up required
reviews.reviewText: I have a MacBook Pro 2023 13.3” and this is a life saver for me. There is no set up required: simply plug in and good to use. The picture quality is supreme. It comes with a carry on bag, well made, and very thoughtful design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up and use....very nice
reviews.reviewText: Nice triple screen add on for my laptop.I tried another brand for 2 years which worked fine but the screens were only 10" screens...This one is 14" screens and perfect size and weight for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work on my laptop
reviews.reviewText: This did not work nor did it have an option to use external power supply to possibly power them on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently got the Leudaich 14'' Laptop Monitor Extender, and it's been a game-changer for my work setup. The FHD IPS display delivers crisp visuals, and the fact that it's portable makes it super convenient for my on-the-go lifestyle. Setting it up with my 14'' laptop was a breeze – just plug and play with HDMI, USB-A, or Type-C. The triple monitor display is fantastic for multitasking, whether I'm working on Windows, Chrome, Mac, or even my Nintendo Switch. Overall, a solid investment for anyone looking to boost their productivity with a versatile and high-quality monitor extender.

Only one HDMI to usb C cable provided . Can only get one of two monitors to work. If I had a second hdmi to USB C I could uses a hub to get the three screens to extend. I can not find a HDMI to USB c cable anywhere to buy. Should have been in the box. USB 3.0 and 2. 0 on laptop send video to my hub but not directly to these monitors. Same as for USB C port.
